contentencoded: In just nine simple digits, social security numbers hold some of our most private information. The code governs so much of our official lives, but can be vulnerable to non-official hacking if proper precautions aren't taken. Paddy Hirsch, Marketplace's senior producer of personal finance, joins Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss steps we can take to protect our personal data.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, September 18, 2013

title: Protecting your social security number from hackers
description: Social security numbers are open to hacking if not properly protected.
